channel.title: Tribes: Ascend
channel.description:
[url]https://account.hirezstudios.com/tribesascend/?referral=2041837&utm_campaign=email[/url]
This is a great game. Free, most importantly. A new FPS with great graphics.
But here's the kicker. Imagine playing your normal FPS... with everyone wearing rollerblades... and wearing jetpacks.....
now make it slightly more sci-fi and you have tribes: ascend.
Extremely fast-paced this game takes alot of skill to play well but its very enjoyable.

item.title: Tribes: Ascend
item.dc:creator: wheybags
item.description:
not sure if spambot, but fun game anyway
